sentences.en: Bud turned the truck around, and started back for Dalton Pond.
sentences.cn: 巴德把卡车掉头，开始返回多尔顿池。

sentences.en: Bud's nose was still black and blue.
sentences.cn: 巴德的鼻子还是青一块紫一块的。
公司的权力, 我们信赖'布德啤酒'.

sentences.en: It is important to recognize jealousy and to nip it in the bud before it gets out of hand.
sentences.cn: 重要的是要甄辨出嫉妒情绪并尽早消除这种心理，以免其一发不可收拾。

sentences.en: Rosanna's favourite time is early summer, just before the buds open.
sentences.cn: 罗莎娜最喜欢的时节是初夏，就在花蕾开放之前。

sentences.en: Six months after Bud died, the house burned down.
sentences.cn: 巴德死后6个月，这座房子被烧毁。

sentences.en: Smudge the outline using a cotton-wool bud.
sentences.cn: 用一根棉签把轮廓抹花。

sentences.en: Some flowers bud their leaves very early in spring.
sentences.cn: 有些花在春季里很早发出叶来.

sentences.en: That weekend in Plattsburgh, he convinced her to go ahead and marry Bud.
sentences.cn: 在普拉茨堡的那个周末，他说服她嫁给巴德。

sentences.en: The flowers are bronzy in bud and bright yellow when open.
sentences.cn: 这些花的花蕾是青铜色，开放后呈明黄色。

sentences.en: The flowers are now in bud.
The terminal bud continues vegetative activity during most of the growing season.
sentences.cn: 在大部分生长季节,这种茎的顶芽继续着植物的生长.

sentences.en: Trees begin to bud in the spring.
When the fruit trees are in bud or blossom, frosts may damage the crops.
sentences.cn: 果树在发芽或开花的时候, 霜冻会使它减产.

sentences.en: Where the hell was Bud, anyhow?
Without love, the best in the bud before killing!
sentences.cn: 得不到的爱情，最好在萌芽之前扼杀！

sentences.en: You heard what the boss said, bud.
sentences.cn: 你听见老板说的话了，老兄。

phrases.tran_cn: 百威淡啤（百威啤酒的一种）
防患于未然；消灭于萌芽状态

trans.tran_en: a young tightly rolled-up flower or leaf before it opens
